document.body:
home archive advertise forum account CAUGHT ON TAPE!!! Chinese Man BRUTALLY BEATS Up Pregnant Woman . . . She Was A CASHIER . . . And Didn't Bring Back His Change QUICKLY ENOUGH!!! (Warning - EXTREME Violence)
January 09, 2010 : We're not sure why everyone just STOOD AROUND and let him do this to that poor lady . . .
